TopicTitle: Long time listener, first time caller

Articles.Content:
Hi all. I finally joined the forum today after a year or so of lurking and reading.

I've been playing KSP at a fairly obsessive pace since May of '14. I usually keep a stock installation and a modded installation, my favorite thing to do lately is change the mod loadout and start a new game from scratch. Right now I have a pretty good mix and I'm having a good time with it. I do prefer a heavily modded installation I think, stock is great but I love all the variety and options.

Favorite mods-

Outer planets Mod

Novapunch

NearFuture (all)

Behemoth Engineering

Necrobones Mods

I go back and forth between CTT and SETI CTT

I'm a self professed space nerd, and a big advocate for science education. So KSP is perfect for me. And...I don't really know what else to put here.
Welcome! SETI, NF, and OPM rock! They're what I use for my modded install, but haven't played in a bit because my Ubuntu is in a login loop.
